/instructions.page.title: Sourdough Instructions
/instructions.page.gettingStarted.title: Getting Started
/instructions.page.gettingStarted.descri: Follow these simple steps to begin your sourdough journey:
/instructions.page.gettingStarted.step1: Feed your starter with equal parts flour and water
/instructions.page.maintenance.title: Daily Maintenance
/instructions.page.maintenance.descripti: Keep your starter healthy with these tips:
/instructions.page.maintenance.tip1: Store in a clean glass jar
/instructions.page.maintenance.tip2: Feed regularly (daily if kept at room temperature)
/instructions.page.maintenance.tip3: Discard half before feeding to maintain proportions
/instructions.page.maintenance.tip4: Refrigerate if not baking for several days
/instructions.page.troubleshooting.title: Troubleshooting
/instructions.page.troubleshooting.issue: Try warmer location and more frequent feeding
This is normal hooch - stir it in or pour it off
/recipes.page.title: Sourdough Recipes
/recipes.page.basicBread.title: Classic Sourdough Bread
/recipes.page.basicBread.description: A traditional artisan loaf with perfect crust and crumb.
/recipes.page.pizzaDough.title: Sourdough Pizza Dough
/recipes.page.pizzaDough.description: Light and flavorful base for your favorite pizza toppings.
/recipes.page.pancakes.title: Sourdough Pancakes
/recipes.page.pancakes.description: Fluffy pancakes using sourdough discard - perfect for weekend breakfast.
/recipes.page.pancakes.ingredient4: 1 tsp baking soda, pinch of salt
/recipes.page.tips.title: Pro Tips
/recipes.page.tips.tip1.title: Temperature Matters
/recipes.page.tips.tip1.description: Warmer environments speed up fermentation, cooler slows it down.
/recipes.page.tips.tip2.title: Hydration Control
/recipes.page.tips.tip2.description: Adjust water content based on flour type and humidity levels.
